title: Yummy
description: The "Yummy" website by Beshoy Will offers an easy-to-use interface for exploring meals, with search options by categories, areas, and ingredients. It features a contact section for user interaction. The design is simple and intuitive for a smooth user experience.

title: FreeToGame
description: The "FreeToGame" website by Beshoy Will is a platform for accessing free games, featuring a login system for user registration. The design focuses on simplicity and user-friendliness, requiring users to sign in or create a new account to access full features.
